feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GLOBAL][VMware Private Cloud] - VMware NSX operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 4, 19:00 UTC  -  Mar 8, 16:00 UTC

Feb 27, 19:11 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 04/03/2024 19:00 UTC
End time : 08/03/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling an update for VMware NSX related product.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Veeam] - Veeam Managed
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 4, 07:00 UTC  -  Mar 8, 17:00 UTC

Feb 27, 16:33 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Veeam Managed offer.

This may temporarily affect some functionality.

Start time : 04/03/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 08/03/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Backup and restore will not be available during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out a update for Veeam managed system.

entry.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 4, 07:00 UTC  -  Mar 8, 17:00 UTC

Feb 26, 20:40 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 04/03/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 08/03/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for VMware vCenter Server services. An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - R802L20
entry.content:
Feb 13, 19:47 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/02/2024 16:05 UTC
End Time : 13/02/2024 17:40 UTC
Root cause : Electrical Disjunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 13, 17:07 UTC
Identified - Start time: 13/02/2024 16:05 UTC
User impact : Somes servers are unreachable.
Root cause : Electrical Disjunction
Ongoing actions : Our team are working to fix the issue.
